attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The purpose of this petition is to get back to basics and offer all mortgages on the same terms to all borrowers.
Why are they so many mortgage deals available.
I am 65 with a small mortgage. When I and my husband had a mortgage at 24 all mortgages were at the same rate you had to have 10% upfront to get one.
People now who are renting multiple properties on tracker mortgages are gaining when people on standard mortgage rates are not receiving the  benefits of the reduced Bank of England rate.
In fact people on disability are only receiving interest paid above base rate of 1.5% and are having to find deficit.
We should get back to basics same rate for all.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
